overview: Lee has worked in the imaging business for over 20 years, from decorated combat photographer for the US military to professional photographer for Corbis to running product development at start-up internet imaging companies and major corporations. His background includes: Advisor & VP of Products at online imaging start-up Digital Railroad; Experience Architect and a Program Manager for HP; Head of Product Development at Pixology, a UK-based imaging software start-up; Senior Producer for Yahoo Photos; Director of Product Management at PictureIQ, an Adobe Ventures start-up, and Director of Interactive Content at Kodak. He also conceived and patented the Kodak PhotoQuilt Web application, cornerstone of Kodakâ€™s Millennium marketing campaign for year 2000 and winner of the Rochester Addy award.
